## ChatDomainProperties interface

Analytics event properties specific to Yext Chat.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ChatDomainProperties 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [botId](./analytics.chatdomainproperties.botid.md) | string | The ID of the bot that generated the event. |
|  [conversationId?](./analytics.chatdomainproperties.conversationid.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The ID of the conversation in which the event occurred. |
|  [responseId?](./analytics.chatdomainproperties.responseid.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The ID of the individual response in which the event occurred. |
